short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improvements on the HTML5 version of Chatango

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is meant to improve the usability of Chatango.

Features:
1. Allows to toggle font color and backgrounds on and off.
2. Toggles through 3 modes of visualization (normal, smaller and compact).
3. Option to align the beginning of everyone's text.
4. Enables Profile Popup on HTML5 on hovering a profile picture.

Only works on HTML5 mode.
